Ingredients.1: 1 (1.41 ounce) package sazon seasoning with coriander and achiote (such as Goya®)

Ingredients.2: 1 (12 fluid ounce) can or bottle Mexican beer

Directions.1: Pour all 8 packets of sazon seasoning into a gallon-sized resealable plastic bag. Add beer, seal, and shake until sazon seasoning is dissolved. Add flank steak and refrigerate 8 hours or overnight.

Directions.2: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate. Remove steak from the bag and discard marinade.

Directions.3: Grill steak on the hot grill for about 6 minutes on each side for medium or until desired doneness. Remove steak from gill and let rest 10 minutes. Slice against the grain.
